resources.string: The 2019 General Elections are almost here and it’s important we all go out, young and old to ensure that the right people are voted in to power.
OKAY, BUT HOW DO I VOTE?

You need to register to vote. For that, you’ll need a Permanent Voters Card (PVC) to be able to vote in the upcoming elections. A PVC can be collected from wards around your area of residence. govote allows you to search for PVC collection centers in your area.
We vote. This is not the time to leave the future up to chance. Get your PVC now and work majestically on election day to cast your vote
An error occurred loading locations, please try again
Download Smart PVC registration locator mobile app via https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.crevhive.govote

string.name: about_app
string.div:
govote was built to make sure that the first hurdle concerning the elections can be cleared; registering to vote.
The codebase for this mobile App have been made open source so that we can all contribute
Also the API and Web App on which this android app leveraged have been made open source so that we can all contribute. The links to their respective repositories can be found below.
govote Android Mobile App was created by Adetuyi Tolu Emmanuel
Likewise the API and we was created by Olayinka Omole and Yomi Eluwande
Links and Credits govote android on GitHub
govote app on GitHub
govote apion GitHub
Illustrations by undraw.co
